root.name: Karaoke Revolution Presents American Idol
root.description: Soundtrack"All My Life" by K-Ci JoJo"Alone" by Heart"Always Something There to Remind Me" by Naked Eyes"Be Without You" by Mary J. Blige"Breakaway" by Kelly Clarkson"Build Me Up Buttercup" by the Foundations"Can't Help Falling in Love" by Elvis Presley"Crazy Little Thing Called Love" by Queen"Dilemma" by Nelly Kelly Rowland"Do I Make You Proud" by Taylor Hicks"Don't Let the Sun Go Down on Me" by Elton John"Don't You Want Me" by the Human League"Easy" by the Commodores"Every Rose Has Its Thorn" by Poison"Heartbreaker" by Pat Benatar"Heaven" by Los Lonely Boys"Hungry Like the Wolf" by Duran Duran"If You Don't Know Me By Now" by Simply Red"It's Not Unusual" by Tom Jones"Just the Way You Are" by Billy Joel"Let's Stay Together" by Al Green"Love Will Keep Us Together" by Captain Tennille"More Than Words" by Extreme"Photograph" by Nickelback"Proud Mary" by Creedence Clearwater Revival"Rock With You" by Michael Jackson"Saving All My Love For You" by Whitney Houston"She Bangs" by Ricky Martin"Stand By Me" by Ben E. King"Stickwitu" by the Pussycat Dolls"Sugar, We're Goin' Down" by Fall Out Boy"Total Eclipse of the Heart" by Bonnie Tyler"Unwritten" by Natasha Bedingfield"What a Girl Wants" by Christina Aguilera"You and Me" by Lifehouse"You've Lost that Lovin' Feelin'" by the Righteous Brothers"Flying Without Wings" by Rubben Studdard (Secret Song)"Piano Man" by Billy Joel (Secret Song)"Straight Up" by Paula Abdul (Secret Song)"The Real Thing" by Bo Bice (Secret Song)
